version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="deliverynotify"> <deliverynotify id="4" name="Delivery Notification"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <motechId/> <datetime/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>deliverynotify-jf</formname> </deliverynotify> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/deliverynotify/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/deliverynotify/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/deliverynotify/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="datetime" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/deliverynotify/datetime" required="true()" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/deliverynotify/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/deliverynotify/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page1</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="datetime"> <xf:label>Date of delivery</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>

versionText.xform: <xform id="4"> <text xpath="xforms/model/instance/deliverynotify[@name]" value="Delivery Notification"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/label" value="Page1"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='staffId']/label" value="Staff ID"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='facilityId']/label" value="Facility ID"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='motechId']/label" value="MoTeCH ID"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='datetime']/label" value="Date of delivery"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='formtype']/label" value="formType"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='formname']/label" value="formName"/> <text xpath="xforms/model/bind[@id='staffId'][@message]" value="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <text xpath="xforms/model/bind[@id='facilityId'][@message]" value="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <text xpath="xforms/model/bind[@id='motechId'][@message]" value="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <text xpath="xforms/model/bind[@id='datetime'][@message]" value="Invalid date: date specified is in the future"/> </xform>
